feed.title: File Browser Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.40.1
entry.content:
Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • 6425cc58b4359ba7df64ed10f3dd6512174d6531 chore(release): 2.40.1
  • 88f144293267260fd4d823e3259783309b1a57b3 fix: print correct user on setup

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.40.2
entry.content:
Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • 5b7ea9f95a444c51c601e0447ab97a19c4917051 chore(release): 2.40.2
